title: SolrJ API does not include streaming uploaded data from Java Writer or OutputStream
description: The SolrJ API does not include the ability to upload data from a java.io.Writer or java.io.OutputStream. To do this requires implementing the ContentStream interface.

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: Lance Norskog, can you elaborate on the use case you have for this and if you believe it is still a need?
